text: allahta garu buhuman kala yutu ayurin ovuhu ohuta garu buhuman nokalaha. ebævin "allah minisa veta kisivak pahala nokaleya" yæyi ovuhu pævasuha. "alokayak ha janayata mangapenvimak lesin musa gena a pustakaya pahala kale kavuda?" yi asanu. numbala eya ven ven pot bavata pat kota eva (samaharak) heli kala atara boho dæ numbala sangavannehuya. numbala ha numbalage mutunmittan nodæna siti dæ numbalata (emagin) uganvanu læbiya. (nabivaraya ! eya pahala kale) allah yæyi pavasanu. ovun niratava sitina dæhi sellam kirimata ovun va atahæra damanu
